column5: Looks wicked good but I see it snag up on anything but open water.   Art
saw it on facebook not legal in ontario   there are five hooks  does look interesting

saw it on facebook not legal in ontario   there are five hooks  does look interesting  Connect two pickeral rigs together and add some swim baits. 4 hooks and I,ll bet it would work and legal.  They look cool , but not my kinda thing.
saw it on facebook not legal in ontario   there are five hooks  does look interesting Should be pretty easy to remove one hook to make it legal.
yup, but i think all 5 baits  will need to be there to be balanced   and i know damn well the fish will bite the one with no hook  lol

Connect two pickeral rigs together and add some swim baits. 4 hooks and I,ll bet it would work and legal.  They look cool , but not my kinda thing. I like your idea of 2 pickerel rigs.  BTW, anyone know what type of line they use on on pickerel rigs? My guess it is regular mono?
